snippet.title: Earthfall - Console Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Aliens have invaded earth and you must band together with other survivors to fight back in Earthfall! Coming to PlayStation 4 and Xbox One this spring. Now available in Early Access on Steam.

Learn more at www.earthfall.com

Buy now on Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/415590/Earthfall/
